properties.entry: SELECT USER_NO, USER_EMAIL, USER_NICKNAME, USER_TEL, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ENROLL_DATE, PROFILE_IMG FROM "USER" WHERE USER_EMAIL = ? AND USER_PW = ? AND USER_DELETE_FG = 'N'
INSERT INTO "USER"(USER_EMAIL, USER_PW, USER_NICKNAME, USER_TEL,ENROLL_DATE, PROFILE_IMG,KAKAO_USER_KEY,USER_DELETE_FG,ADMINISTER) VALUES(?, ? , ? , ? , DEFAULT, NULL, NULL, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)
UPDATE CERTIFICATION SET CODE_NUMBER = ?, ISSUE_DT = SYSDATE WHERE EMAIL = ?

SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT '1' FROM CERTIFICATION WHERE EMAIL = ? AND CODE_NUMBER = ?) = 1
THEN NVL( (SELECT '1' FROM CERTIFICATION WHERE EMAIL = ? AND ISSUE_DT + (INTERVAL '5' MINUTE) >= SYSDATE) , '2')
ELSE '3' END FROM DUAL
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER WHERE USER_EMAIL = ? AND SECESSION_FL = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "USER" WHERE USER_DELETE_FG = 'N' AND USER_NO = ? AND USER_PW = ?
